segments.text: When are we leaving for our field trip ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our science field trip is next Monday at 8 a . m . in the morning . Can you mark that on your calendar ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I will write that down .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That will be Monday , December 2nd . We need to start loading the buses half an hour early , so plan to arrive at 7 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I will be there on time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We will return 6 days later on December 8th . Will someone be picking you up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , someone is coming to get me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The return bus will leave the campground at 5 p . m . and return to campus 3 hours later at 8 p . m .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What should we bring with us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am going to post all of that information on the geology club web page . Check it out when you get a chance . See you Monday !
segments.speaker: S2
